title: How to use Devise Inside a Mountable Engine
body:
I followed the steps from https://github.com/plataformatec/devise/wiki/How-To%3a-Use-devise-inside-a-mountable-engine every thing goes perfectly until i reach the command "rails generate devise MODEL"
i replaced MODEL as User
It shows error

invoke  active_record
 create    db/migrate/20140901111733_devise_create_fd_users.rb
